name: Spiced Cranberry Sauce
keywords: cranberry, spices, sugar, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, fall, winter, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1/3 teaspoon each of cinnamon, allspice and nutmeg (or) 1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and clean the cranberries, place them in a pan with vinegar and cook over low heat until the berries pop and soften. Put through a sieve and return to the pan.
Add spices, salt and sugar. Continue to cook over low heat until the spices are blended. Pour into hot sterilized jars and seal.
